headline: Devon Energy Schedules Fourth-Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Devon Energy Corp. (NYSE: DVN) today announced it will report fourth-quarter 2025 results on Tuesday, Feb. 17, after the close of U.S. financial markets. The earnings release and presentation for the fourth-quarter 2025 results will be available on the company’s website at www.devonenergy.com. On Wednesday, Feb. 18, the company will hold a conference call at 10 a.m. CDT (11 a.m. EDT), which will consist primarily of answers to questions from analy
